# Examples

## Test cross reference in different files

Quicksort algorithm is shown as @alg-quicksort (using `@alg-quicksort`). Quarto custom cross reference in different files works both with `html` and `pdf` format.

## Test Quarto custom cross reference

```pseudocode
#| html-line-number: false
#| pdf-line-number: false

\Procedure{Test-Quarto-Custom-Cross-Reference}{}

\EndProcedure
\end{algorithmic}
\end{algorithm}
```
